# PED::SET_AMBIENT_LAW_PED_ACCURACY_MODIFIER

## Summary
Sets global ambient law ped accuracy modifier (only works in MP). Need to call this every frame, otherwise it's going to rever to default value

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** newAccuracy
